DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this trial is to study the efavirenz-rifabutin interaction. Thus, this trial will enroll patients with HIV and tuberculosis co-infections who are receiving a rifabutin-based regimen and who plan to begin an antiretroviral regimen containing efavirenz dosed at 600 mg daily. Enrollment in TB Trials Consortium Study 23 is not a requirement for participation in this study. Primary Objective: To compare the pharmacokinetics of rifabutin at 600 mg twice a week in combination with efavirenz 600 mg daily to the pharmacokinetics of rifabutin 300 mg twice a week without efavirenz.
DOC.brief_title: TBTC Study 23C: Pharmacokinetics of Intermittent Rifabutin and Isoniazid With Daily Efavirenz
DOC.criteria: Patients with HIV and tuberculosis coinfections who are receiving a rifabutinbased regimen and who plan to begin an antiretroviral regimen containing efavirenz dosed at 600 mg daily.
